inclusion.criterion: Ability to read, write and speak German or French
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Women of child bearing potential must test negative on standard urine pregnancy test two weeks prior to the start of the study and must agree to practice appropriate contraceptive methods until the end of the study
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Provision of voluntary consent to participate in the study, following a full explanation of the nature and purpose of the study, by signing the informed consent approved by the cantonal Ethics Committee (IEC) prior to all evaluations
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Surgical intervention to genito-urinary tract in the last 6 months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients receiving any other concurrent catheter irrigation
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Known allergy or sensitivity to any of the ingredients in Uro-Tainer Polihexanide 0.02%
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known allergy or sensitivity to chlorhexidine
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of CVA, neurogenic bladder with indwelling suprapubic catheter and recurrent UTIs. They are currently on ditropan and detrol for urinary incontinence.
